Noun: a rigid circular band of metal or wood or other material used for holding or fastening or hanging or pulling
the sound of a bell ringing
a platform usually marked off by ropes in which contestants box or wrestle
jewelry consisting of a circlet of precious metal (often set with jewel)
a strip of material attached to the leg of a bird to identify it (as in studies of bird migratio)
Verb: get or try to get into communication (with someon)
extend on all sides of simultaneously; encircle
attach a ring to the foot of, in order to identify
